message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $90 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $75?
Bob, I appreciate you offering $75. While I value your interest,  I can't go that low. How about we meet in the middle at $85? I'm confident this product will be worth every penny for you.
